thread.title: Netanyahu confidante flips in corruption probe: media

title: Netanyahu confidante flips in corruption probe: media
text:
Netanyahu confidante flips in corruption probe: media 4:00am IST - 01:10 
Local media reporting Wednesday a confidant of the Israeli Prime Minister has agreed to turn state's witness in one of a series of corruption investigations posing a threat to Netanyahu’s long dominance of Israeli politics.   
Local media reporting Wednesday a confidant of the Israeli Prime Minister has agreed to turn state's witness in one of a series of corruption investigations posing a threat to Netanyahu’s long dominance of Israeli politics.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/02/21/netanyahu-confidante-flips-in-corruption?videoId=403179511&videoChannel=13423
